title: when u have a feder in your team you get ban
body: what a fuking nice game.pls dont just think sale you skins. this is pvp game.

replies.body: This is the big problem right now. So many players with honour ribbons are getting banned / suspended because of rage towards a feeder / inter / griefer but the griefers just carry on and get nothing because the chatbots dont catch them swearing.so feeder wins this game just about luck{{sticker:slayer-jinx- catface}} and LOL just want to make money{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}

Man i just copped a 14 day suspension for this exact problem. I copped a comms ban from an anivia support walling the team into enemys on purpose to kill them. Then i just copped a 14 day suspesion from an iron 2 ashe mid who ran it down mid. I dont know what is wrong with match making in this game now. I am a s4-s1 player. and i constantly get b4-I4 players in my matches. How is it that you can put players in a game with team mates 2 divisions above them. This game has just become who gets the biggest troll or lowest elo players lose.
